name: The Chasm: Crown
description:
A Card Back won by achieving excellent results in open Genius Invokation TCG tournaments.
Gold: It represents the most glorious form that wealth can take. Whether you're an adventurer, miner, or card player, it represents the crowning achievement of your career...
descriptionraw: A Card Back won by achieving excellent results in open Genius Invokation TCG tournaments.\nGold: It represents the most glorious form that wealth can take. Whether you're an adventurer, miner, or card player, it represents the crowning achievement of your career...
